AMPS GRIB file metadata

Source: R/raadtools.R
amps_metadata.Rd

GRIB format metadata from the Antarctic Mesoscale Prediction System (AMPS) files.

Format

amps_metadata A data frame with 8 columns. The columns represent

Bandthe band number
GRIB_COMMENTthe data measured
GRIB_ELEMENTthe data name
GRIB_FORECAST_SECONDSforecast seconds
GRIB_REF_TIMEtext reference time
GRIB_SHORT_NAMEshort name
GRIB_UNITtext unit
GRIB_VALID_TIMEtext valid time
Band

Examples

print(amps_metadata)
#> # A tibble: 254 x 8
#>    Band  GRIB_COMMENT GRIB_ELEMENT GRIB_FORECAST_S… GRIB_REF_TIME
#>    <chr> <chr>        <chr>        <chr>            <chr>        
#>  1 1     undefined[-] var176       0sec             1445774400se…
#>  2 2     undefined[-] var177       0sec             1445774400se…
#>  3 3     Icecover(ice ICEC         0sec             1445774400se…
#>  4 4     Landcover(l… LAND         0sec             1445774400se…
#>  5 5     u-component… UGRD         0sec             1445774400se…
#>  6 6     u-component… UGRD         0sec             1445774400se…
#>  7 7     u-component… UGRD         0sec             1445774400se…
#>  8 8     u-component… UGRD         0sec             1445774400se…
#>  9 9     u-component… UGRD         0sec             1445774400se…
#> 10 10    u-component… UGRD         0sec             1445774400se…
#> # ... with 244 more rows, and 3 more variables: GRIB_SHORT_NAME <chr>,
#> #   GRIB_UNIT <chr>, GRIB_VALID_TIME <chr>
